word_mean: 订约双方对已订立的合同或协议加以补充或修改而制定的书面文件

sentence.Network_en: This is an addendum to the book.
The quantum theory is not just an esoteric addendum.
sentence.Network_cn: 量子理论并不只是一个深奥的附录.

sentence.Network_en: And also a vocabulary list of Shuitian attached in addendum 1.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时在附录一中补充列举了水田话词汇表.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: Latin, that which is to be added', gerundive of addere (see add)

entry.def: An addendum is an additional section at the end of a book or document.

means.word_mean: 1. textual matter that is added onto a publication; usually at the end
